scripts.build: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --progress --color --config webpack/config.renderer.js" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack --progress --color --config webpack/config.main.js"
scripts.build:production: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --progress --color --config webpack/config.renderer.js" "cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --progress --color --config webpack/config.main.js"
scripts.pack:linux: npm run build:production && electron-packager build/ Demo --platform=linux --arch=x64 --version=1.8.6 --asar --package-manager yarn --overwrite --out dist/
scripts.pack:mac: npm run build:production && electron-packager build/ Demo --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=1.8.6 --asar --package-manager yarn --overwrite --out dist/
